title.rendered: 8 Messaging Apps that Can Block Explicit Photos

content.rendered:
Did you know that with Cover’s Auto-Hide functionality, you can protect your messaging apps from explicit content?

With Cover, the ultimate secret photo & video vault, you’ll be able to block adult content and keep your Android device completely clean around the clock. Meaning, the app will automatically detect and hide any explicit content that is stored or sent to your device.

At Baloota Applications, we really strive to develop applications that make peoples digital lives easier to deal with. In order to do this, we are constantly listening to your feedback. We’ve been closely monitoring the feedback we’ve been receiving for our photo, video & files vault app, and have noticed that there are so many popular messaging apps across different countries.

We’ve been working on exciting things over the course of the past few months and are excited to publicly announce our latest update! Cover is now compatible with eight of the world’s most popular messaging apps!

What Messaging Apps are Compatible with Cover?

Cover was originally compatible with the most popular messaging apps, such as WhatsApp and Facebook Messenger, however, as we expand and develop, we decided to add even more widely-used messaging apps. Cover now supports the following messaging apps:

  • WhatsApp
  • Telegram
  • Messenger
  • Viber
  • Imo
  • Kakao
  • Line
  • Kik

In order for Cover to start monitoring your messages (with your permission of course) for explicit content, all you need to do is download the app from the Google Play store and let it work its magic. In addition to messaging protection, you’ll also have a dedicated photo vault to move any adult content to a passcode encrypted gallery.  

We can’t wait for you to try it out! If you have any feedback, please contact our support team. If you enjoy the app, we’d really appreciate a 5-star review and rating.

Keep on the lookout for more releases & updates, and if you want us to consider adding one of your favourite messaging apps or support for your language, get in touch! We love receiving messages from our loyal users.

We genuinely value all of our community and read every review, support ticket, and email. Cover, the secret and most powerful photo & video vault is completely free to use.

What are you waiting for? No one has ever regretted downloading Cover. After all, it’s free and takes care of all of your photo privacy needs. Don’t forget that Cover does not even need internet access to work. Everything works on your device which allows for constant, on the go protection and privacy – its what we do!

Download Cover Now!
